DiceSwap - Class in it.polimi.se2018.model.events
This class is used to encapsulate the data needed for the action of swapping one Die from the DraftPool with a Die of the RoundTrack.

Die - Class in it.polimi.se2018.model
The class represent a six-sides Die.
Die(Random, Colour) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.model.Die
Constructor to be used when a Die is rolled or drafted from the DiceBag: the value is a random number between 1 and 6.
Die(int, Random, Colour) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.model.Die
Constructor to be used when the Die's value has to be chosen in a non-random way: it is the case of the use of a ToolCard.
DieValueException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.model
Unchecked exception thrown by the Die when building a Die with value out of the 1-6 range.
